link_mentions.page: List of barons in the peerages of Britain and Ireland
List of hereditary peers elected under the House of Lords Act 1999

response: Her descendant Roualeyn Hovell-Thurlow-Cumming-Bruce, 9th Baron Thurlow, inherited the title in 2013 and in 2015 was elected by his fellow peers to a vacant seat in the House of Lords.Lord Thurlow at parliament.uk, accessed 10 December 2017.
